pageContext.claim: “You know Jamaica, right? I always said, Long Island. It's very close. ... I essentially grew up on Long Island.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump grew up in Jamaica, Queens. New Yorkers will tell you this is not really "Long Island." Instead, "Long Island" usually refers to the suburbs in Nassau and Suffolk counties, which start a good 20 miles east of Jamaica. That all said, if you want to get technical about it, Jamaica and Nassau and Suffolk counties all share the same island land mass.
